content.rendered:
A qualified Chartered Accountant and Economics Graduate, David has a career history spanning 25 years in the marine industry, working for both owners and service providers covering technical services, procurement, consultancy and insurance. Prior to joining the Group in February 2017 as Finance Director for Braemar Technical Services, David has held senior roles or provided advisory services to companies including V.Ships, P&O Containers and Wrist Ship Supply.

With a strong commercial slant, David’s experience includes business transformation and process improvement, strategic development and has led both acquisitions and business divestments.

A keen marathon runner, David feels that he is well equipped to help the business exceed the needs of our clients in this fast paced changing environment.
